tinyobj_attrib_t

Object attributes .obj format

Fields
v

Geometric vertices

v_count

Geometric vertex count

vn

Vertex normals

vn_count

Vertex normal count

vt

Texture vertices

vt_count

Texture vertex count

vp

Parameter space vertices

vp_count

Parameter space vertex count

f

Object faces

f_count

Face count

triangle_count_total

Total count of triangles

l

Lines

l_count

Line count

p

Points
